page.title: 11Home Life
page.content:
An Ordinary Day in my Life by Mary
At 7.30 I wake up to the sound of my bedroom door opening. I am vaguely aware of my Mum coming in and turning the radio on. She sees I am awake and says "Hi". I grunt to her and settle down on my pillow to listen to a competition called Password. That over, I lay in bed a couple of minutes and then get up and get dressed. I talk to the budgies and then go downstairs for my breakfast; Shreddies and milk. My Dad departs at 8.20 and cycles to his job at Drax Power Station. I leave for school at 8.50. I work until 12.00 and then come home for dinner. I return to school at !.00 and work until 3.45. At home I read until 6.00 when I have tea. I wash up then mend my clock until bed.
